pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: A green bus with an advertisement on its side is seen moving through an intersection, followed by a blue van entering the frame from the right. The blue van continues to move forward, passing the green bus and heading towards the left side of the frame. As the blue van moves further, a white van appears from the right and follows the same path. The blue van continues to drive away, and a black car enters the frame from the right, following the same path. The black car continues to move forward, and the blue van is now further down the road. The black car follows the blue van, and the white van is now further down the road. The black car continues to follow the blue van, and the white van is almost out of the frame. The black car continues to move forward, and the blue van is now further down the road. The black car follows the blue van, and the white van is now out of the frame.
